last_episode_to_air.name: Resurrection
last_episode_to_air.overview: After dealing with Monk and Proshun's menace, Savitri gets confronted with the daunting responsibility of choosing an ideal successor to safeguard the spirit of Rani Cooperative.

name: Saas, Bahu Aur Flamingo
overview: Savitri, the matriarch of a massive cartel in the lawless Borderlands, opens up a battle for succession to find her heir in a murky world of drugs and violence.

episodes.name: Homecoming
episodes.overview: As Savitri prepares for the return of her sons, she, her bahus and her daughter face a deadly threat. Will the boys learn the long-hidden family truth?

episodes.name: Lifting the Veil
episodes.overview: The women successfully repel the attack on the Haveli but have to hide it from the men. As internal dynamics are revealed, they are threatened by the police and an old foe.

episodes.name: Genesis
episodes.overview: Following the discovery of the vast subterranean cocaine plantation, Savitri reveals her life story to her sons. Elsewhere, Monk joins forces with one of her adversaries.

episodes.name: Remains of the Day
episodes.overview: The disclosure of the succession opens Pandora's box in the family. Proshun comes dangerously close to the business with new discoveries.

episodes.name: The Enemy Within
episodes.overview: Savitri's time is running out as another massive invasion descends on her domain. Danger lurks around every corner as death sneaks into the Haveli.

episodes.name: Bittersweet Bye-Bye
episodes.overview: Donze continues his research with Shanta on the miraculous drug, Pink Unicorn. The atmosphere in the Haveli turns tense, revealing various hidden facts about people and their goals.

episodes.name: The Day the Music Died
episodes.overview: Devastated by Donze's death, Savitri pursues an old ally to counter Proshun's threat. As Janmashtami approaches, she tries to protect the Haveli from Monk's wrath.

episodes.name: Resurrection
episodes.overview: After dealing with Monk and Proshun's menace, Savitri gets confronted with the daunting responsibility of choosing an ideal successor to safeguard the spirit of Rani Cooperative.
